name: ciphering-cli
description: This is a comand line (CLI) application. Supported ciphers to encode/decode the text: * [Caesar cipher](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caesar_cipher) * [Atbash cipher](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atbash) * [ROT-8 as variation of ROT-13](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ROT13)
author: Strronciy
